title: Oil Rises as Tensions Over Iran Eclipse Signs of Inventory Build
description: Oil gained as tensions in the Middle East focused on Iran outweighed a US industry report that pointed to a big rise in stockpiles.
content: Oil gained as tensions in the Middle East focused on Iran outweighed a US industry report that pointed to a big rise in stockpiles.
